name: Derby Chase
description:
Play In Your Browser or download for Windows.

Keyboard Controls
  • Arrow keys or W A S D keys to steer your car
  • CTRL key for turbo boost
  • ESC key during game for pause menu
Game Pad Controls
  • D-pad or left stick to steer your car
  • A button for turbo boost
  • Start button during game for pause menu
Game Play
  • Progress to the next map once you have picked up all of the pellets and power pellets on the map.
  • Make sure you complete the map before your time runs out.
Version History September 10, 2020 - Version 1.0.0.1
  • BUG FIXED: if player died right as the last pickup was obtained you would be forced to start the same map over again
